metadata.title: CVE-2021-36370 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Midnight Commander through 4.8.26. Whenestablishing an SFTP connection, the fingerprint of the server is neitherchecked nor displayed. As a result, a user connects to the server withoutthe ability to verify its authenticity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mc - 3:4.8.27-1
mc-data - 3:4.8.27-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mc package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.8.27-1').
